org.sbml.squeezer.io
Interface DisplaySBML

All Known Implementing Classes:
TextExport
public interface DisplaySBML

A super class for all export methods that convert the contence of JSBML objects into a human-readable format.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Dieudonné Motsuo Wouamba, Andreas Dräger
